301a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'thun te/ mdor na chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i lta ba dang bsngo ba ma nor bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// 
301a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las/ sred pa rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i sred pa dang 
301a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtse lnga dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa dbyer med par mnyam par spyod pa'i sred pa dang / sems can thams cad bla na med par sgrol bar bya ba'i thabs la sred pas na rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// 
301a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ dargyam rnam par dag pa ga / ste/ rlu chu bsems dpa'i ga gis 'byung ba na/ pa kyimashes dang / rabaci ram tu sbyin pa yang phyag rgya can pa dang / ma 
301a7(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ rgyan rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 
301a8(rgyud 'grel): tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i sku mnyam pa nyid yin pas nor bu dang gos la sogs te/ bzang po'i bya ba'i rgyan thams cad kyang / 'phags pa bdag gi lha nyid la yon du phul ba dang 
301b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lha dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas su yang khyad par dbyer med de/ 'phags pa thams cad la mnyam par bsngos pas bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur 
301b2(rgyud 'grel): bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ rtag tu 'dod chags kyi mda' bshad pa dang 
301b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ste/ mdor na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na 'dod chags su snang ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs ci spyod kyang sems can gyi ma rig pa'i spyod pa dang 
301b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni 
301b5(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas mngon spyod byed pa'i tshe sems can ma rungs pa 'dul ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi gnas na sdod cing bskyed 
301b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsngo bas zhe sdang du snang ba'i chos spyod kyis kyang sems can ma rig pa'i spyod pa dang mi 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ gti mug 
301b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid du spyod te/ bdag dang gzhan du khyad par gyis mtshan mar mi 'dzin
301b8(rgyud 'grel): pas rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod kyang phyin ci log gi gti mug ma yin gyi mi shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pas na rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ 
302a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go/ zhes 'byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dusman dbang po drug yul drug la 
302a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs te/ thams cad la spyod kyis kyang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bsngo ba ma nor bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ spyod do cog kyang bsod na mos kyi tshigs su 'gyur bas rnam par dag 
302a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ mngal rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par// / 
302a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mchod pa sna tshogs 'od zeng las bkye ste/ mchod pa bsdus pa dang / dga' ba bul bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ 
302a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i dga' ba'i phyir ro// rnam pa gcig tu na tshul 'di ltar spyod pa'i 'bras bu yang btsun pa rig 'dzin byang chub kyi gnas par 'gyur ro// gzhung las/ mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i tshig/ 
302a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i dus na chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang rang gi
302a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ci la spyod kyang de nyid dbyer med par mnyam pa nyid pas mtshan mas bcings pa'i nyon mongs par mi 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ yid rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di 
302a8(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la phyag rgya chen po'i sbubs yid mgu ba dang dga' ba dang 
302b1(rgyud 'grel): rangs pa kun kyang bdag gi lha nyid la mchod pa dang yang 'dra/ bdag gi lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du yang dbyer med pas/ 'phags pa thams cad la yang mchod par bsngo// yid dga' ba dang
302b2(rgyud 'grel): mgu'i longs spyod sems can thams cad kyis kyang myong bar bsngos na bdag gi yid dga' ba dang nyon mongs pas bcing bar mi 'gyur bas su dga' bar byed pa rkyen po yang bsod nams thob par 'gyur bas rnam par 
302b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ snang ba rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par
302b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i skyabs gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang bdag gi lha'i gzugs mthong ba ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ lus bde ba rnam 
302b5(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na lus nyid bdag gi lha'i gzugs pas sdug 
302b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis med pas na lus shin tu bde ba yin te/ lus kyi bskyod par thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas bsgyur bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rnam par 
302b7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ ngag rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa 
302b8(rgyud 'grel): dasung ba'i dus na gag nga bzhin thams cadang na gyi ste/ de bzhin ga shegs pa dru'i byid kyis smras sa cag thams cad sngags su su pas nyon mongs par thong ba mi bgyu gyis rnam par dag 
303a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ yid rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes 
303a2(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ci byung yang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid pas bsngo ba ma nor na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te rnam par thar pa'i phyir ro// 
303a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i 
303a4(rgyud 'grel): dus na gzugs so cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir gzugs dang kha dog dbyibs ji ltar mthong ba phyag rgya chen po'i sku nyid la mchod par bsngo ba ma nor bas sems can nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 
303a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gyi/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ sgra rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
303a6(rgyud 'grel): byiphyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na sgra bo cog rang bzhin med pas tshig dang ro kun stan dbyer med par thams cad rol mo'i sil snyan sna tshogs bdag nyid lha'i gzugs la mchod par bsngos na sgra thams cad kyi nang 
303a7(rgyud 'grel): na spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ dri rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa 
303a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na dri thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir dri zhim pa dang mi zhim po khyad par du mi byed par dri mchog gis lha nyid la mchod par byed pas 
303b1(rgyud 'grel): bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nams su 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ ro rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni stong pa 
303b2(rgyud 'grel): ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na ro thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas na kha zas zhim po dang mi zhim pa dang gtsang ba dang / sme ba med de thams cad 
303b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang zil ngar bdud rtsi lta bu'i lha la mchod par bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ reg bya rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems 
303b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i tshig go// zhes 'byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gnyi ga yin pa'i lus kyi reg bya 
303b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas na bde mi bde'i khyad par ni dbye ba thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog gis bdag gis lha nyid la mchod par bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nams su 'gyur bas rnam 
303b6(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ chos rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go/ zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
303b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye mi 'gag rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pas chos thams cad du spyod pa la 'jug gis byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching 
303b8(rgyud 'grel): bar 'i 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis la sogs pa chos kun la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la spyong ba ni 
304a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur/ chos rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod cing bsngo ba ma nor ba ni bsad nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhung las// 
304a2(rgyud 'grel): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas ngo bo nyid rnam par dag ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// zhes 'byung 
304a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rtag tu spros pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de la ma gtogs pa'i chos zhes bya ba gud na med de/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul dang byis pa ma rabs kyi spyod yul yang chos nyid 'di la spyod par zad de/ chos kyi 
304a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid shes pa dang mi shes pa'i khyad par gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang rnam par dag par 'gyur bar zad do// de'i phyir na rtag tu smos pa'i chos so cag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ chos 
304a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi rnam par dag pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ji ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang stong pa'i mtshan nyid de rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i
304a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma sna tshogs la spyod pa yang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pas shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i 'brel pas spyod do cog kyang chud mi zos shing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing 
304a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro// gzhung las/ lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par bsgrub pa'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
304a8(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa dang / chod pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa chen po 
304b1(rgyud 'grel): mang du bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba dang ngan song du skye bar nam yang mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par 'gyur ro// zhes 'byung ba ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo lag na rdo rje la
304b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad de/ su la la zhig chos rgya chen po 'di la dad pas 'jug na chos 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i chos/ 'di ni 'tshang ba'i chos/ 'di ni spyod pa'i chos/ 'di ni mi spyod pa'o// zhes rnam par 
304b3(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba med do// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa ni stong pa nyid de ye shes dang gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ rnam par dag pa'i sgo ma yin te/ chos rgya chen po 'di lan cig thos na yang nam 
304b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gcod pa la sogs te sgrib par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i chos thams cad kyi nang du zhugs te spyod 
304b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pas sgrib ces bya ba'i chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes par rang bzhin stong pas na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang
304b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu med pas dmyal ba dang ngan song du nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur zhes gsungs pa yin no// sdig pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pas spyod pa nyid kyi tshe na 'ching bar mi 'gyur// sdig pa byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal 
304b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / nan tan ji ltar byas na 'grub ce na/ gzhung las/ gang 'dzin pa dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid 
304b8(rgyud 'grel): la byed pa na zhes 'byung ba ste/ bcangs te mnyan nas gzungs su 'dzin pa dang / 'dris par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas nan tan du byed pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi 
305a1(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos sgrub pa'i don ji lta bu thob par 'gyur zhe na/ gzhung las/ des tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu/ 
305a2(rgyud 'grel): thob pas chos thams cad la rab tu dbang bar 'gyur/ mos pa dang / dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba thams cad myong / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe bcu drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 
305a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes 'byung ba ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du sbyor ba thams cad nan tan du byed pa ni thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 
305a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pas chos so cog thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings las tha mi dad pas sems bskyed pa'i phyir dge ba dang sdig pa'i chos mtshungs par spyod kyis kyang 'ching ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad la dbang ba 
305a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ 'jig rten gyis longs spyod thams cad myong bar gyur kyang 'ching ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur bas dus thams cad du gnod pa'i mi bde ba med pas tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin rab tu thob 
305a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ba yang tshe shin tu ring ba'i gnas nas bsgrubs pa yin/ hU~M zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bsdus pa'i don te/ thog ma med pa tshun chad nyon mongs pa'i las kyi bag chags thams cad bsdus nas
305a7(rgyud 'grel): med par bya ba'i don to// yang rnam pa gcig tu na rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa bon 'di las bskyed pa'i phyir bsod nams tshogs thams cad sdud pa'i phyir ro// 
305a8(rgyud 'grel): yang rnam pa gcig tu na rdo rje lta bu drag shul che ba'i snying po bas sems can 'dul dka' ba ma rungs pa thams cad bsdus nas 'joms shing 'jig par byed pa'i don to// gzhung las/ de nas bcom 
305b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po zhes 'byung ba nas/ badz+ra hU~M zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'dir yang rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 
305b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin sngon du thugs su chud pa/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa/ dkyil 'khor 
305b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus pa rdo rje 'dzin sems can kun las 'phags pa'i phyir mchog/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems/ 
305b4(rgyud 'grel): can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par 'dul zhing mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i don la sems can thams cad btsud nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rigs 'dzin gyi gnas thob par 
305b5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa dang / bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams ca dngad ldan pas sgrib pa med pa'i phyir don thams cad grub pa ni la gan rdo ste/ dam chog thams cad dang yang ldan la mnyam par 
305b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po yang mi gtong ba'i tshul du bzhugs shing zha 'bring ba 'khor yang rdo rje gnod sbyin mang pos byas nas shes rab dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyi don bstan pas 
305b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can yang de la mdzud par mdzad de/ sems can chos rgya chen po 'di la zhugs pa rnams don chud mi za bar thugs su chud pas shin tu dgyes pa'i tshul gyis zhal 'dzum ste/ rdo rje chen po 
305b8(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs dang yum lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lag pa g.yon pas gsor te/ cis kyang mi 'jigs mi skrag pa'i bsnyen pas rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bsod 
306a1(rgyud 'grel): nams dang ye shes chen po'i tshogs mnga' ba bde ba chen po'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i dam tshig sems can thams cad yongs su smin par 
306a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i chos thugs su chud nas rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying por gsungs te/ badz+ra hUM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi snying po brtan par bya ba'i don bstan nas/ badz+ra swa bsnun to// 
306a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba nas myur du bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// a nes 'byung ba'i bang du ste/ bcom ldan 
306a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par bstan te/ rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor stod pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul du zhugs pa'i
306a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rdo rje'i mtshan nyid ni sra ba'i phyir phyog mtshan rdo rje bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par 
306a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dra rdza rigs kyigatsa ba dang / gcapa mtshan nyid lta bu ste mnyam par gnas sa// ri po che'i rigs kyi dkyil la / rin pa na 'din ni dbang bskur ba yin te/ drug macan yang 
306a7(rgyud 'grel): rin po che bsnams te/ chos stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang rin po che'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
306a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rin po che lngas dbang bskur na gling bzhi la dbang byed pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rin po che'i 
306b1(rgyud 'grel): tsad pan la sogs pa dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi don mdzad cing mnyam par rdzogs pa'i gnas so// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir pad+ma 'dam gyis mgos 
306b2(rgyud 'grel): pabazhin te/ phyag mtshan pad+ma bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bar yang chos kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid du ldan pa mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs par 
306b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas so// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad dbyings kyis khyab ste ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro// dngos grub kyi bya ba sna tshogs mdzad pas phyag mtshan yang 
306b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rdo rje rgyu gram bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba yang las kyi rigs kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas gnas te/ de ltar sa 
306b5(rgyud 'grel): so'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yang longs spyod kyi tshul 'di ltar zhugs/ dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug 'dod pa rnams kyang chos stong pa nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la goms par bya ste/ chos 
306b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan thos la sogs pas nan tan du byas na chos so cog thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i bcing bar mi 'gyur bas snying po byang chub la 'dug 
306b7(rgyud 'grel): gi bar du ngan song thams cad las 'das par 'gyur/ chos nyid la gnas pas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul te/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs shing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par/ 
306b8(rgyud 'grel): 'tshang rgya'o// a zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa spros pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don ston pa'i phyir ro// gzhung las/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal zhes bya ba nas 
307a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra aM aHzhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ zhes 'byung ba rtag tu brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang ngag yid gsum rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 
307a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i zhes bya bas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yang sems can yongs su smin pa'i don du 'gyur bas 'dzum dmul te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
307a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyar ba nyid kyi phyir snying po// badz+ra a~M a zhes gsungs te/ stong pa ma skyes pa'i don a/ 'di las brtan par bya ba'i phyir ro// oM zhes bya ba'i don lta ba'i chogs/ gzhung las/ thams cad 
307a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba na zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang sems can gyi don gyi phyir stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab 
307a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i don ni 'jig rten thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsdu ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yangs pa 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi 
307a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga yab yum lnga mnyam par gnas pa yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba med pas 'dod chags spras pa med pa'i phyir bdag dang 
307a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du lta ba med par mnyam pas na zhe sdang mi 'byung bas zhe sdang spros pa med do// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ snying rje chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can ma rungs pa 'dul ba dang / gnas bde 
307a8(rgyud 'grel): bar bskyed par bya ba'i phyir mngon spyod kyi dbang byed de/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas zhe sdang gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i 
307b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas zhe sdang spros pa med pa'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug gis gzung ba med pa'i phyir spyod pas gti mug spros pa med do// gti mug gis gzung ba'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang ni 
307b2(rgyud 'grel): bcings par 'gyur gyi/ gti mug med pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi las spyod pa ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes 
307b3(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod de/ rnam par mi rtog pa nyid pas mi shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste/ gti mug gi rang bzhin med pas gti mug spros pa med pa'i phyir chos so cog thams cad spros pa med do// 
307b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pas na gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa'i tshul du sbyor zhing dngos grub thams cad kyi las byed kyang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba med 
307b5(rgyud 'grel): pas chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos so cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas 
307b6(rgyud 'grel): spros pa med par rig par bya'o// 'di ltar zhal nas gsungs dkyil 'khor 'di'i don la 'jug cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa la sogs pa nan tan du byed na de 'dul ba'i dbang 
307b7(rgyud 'grel): gis phyir chos so cog thams cad stong pa nyid pas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du mi 'gro bar 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
307b8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid kyis sdig pa rang bzhin yod la 'bras bu bsags na sems can gcig gsad pa'i sdig pa bzhin du mang du bsad pa tshogs che bar yang mngon na/ stong pa nyid 
308a1(rgyud 'grel): kye ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pas sems can gyi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir sdig pa'i rang bzhin yang med de 'dul ba'i 
308a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi phyir sdig pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ hU~M zhes bya ba'i don 'di lhag ma dang 'dra'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba 
308a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ badz+ra hU~M zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rtag tu gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos mnyam par spyod pa'i don sems can bstan pa yan chud mi za zhing rnam 
308a4(rgyud 'grel): par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhal 'dzum ste/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas lus gzi brjid chen po gzhan thams cad skrag cing spa skong ba'i tshul du bskur te/ badz+ra nU 
308a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba gsungs so// badz+ra hUM gi don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'dra/ gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'i chos nyid ces pa nas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
308a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o// hUM zhes 'byung ba'i bar du ste/ chos kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi gtso bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bstan te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos rgya 
308a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po yangs pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di bstan to// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dastong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na 'dod chags kyi spyod yul thams cad 
308a8(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag par 'gyur ba yin gyi 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pas bcings par mi 'gyur te/ stong pa nyid dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos dag pa'i mtshan nyid pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad kyis gnod par 
308b1(rgyud 'grel): mi nus pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir bdag gi phyogs mi 'dzin pas zhe sdang mi 'byung mod kyi snying rje
308b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gzugs kyi sems can ma rungs pa 'dul ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi gnas ngan pa las gdon pa'i dbang mdzad mod kyi/ zhe sdang gi nyon mongs par mi 'gyur bas zhe sdar rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ 
308b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la dbang du spyod pas na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yin te zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ nyon mongs pa'i
308b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bur mi 'gyur bas sgrib pa med pas chos nyid stong pa nyid kyi dbyings pas dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// chos nyid kyi ngo bos chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid 
308b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de dri ma'i chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste sdig pa'i tshogs su mi 'gyur bas sdig pa'i chos rnam par dag pa ste/ dngos grub kyi chos thams cad 
308b6(rgyud 'grel): la spyod cing grub pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o// rdo rje rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de sdig pa'i chos thams cad chos nyid kyis stong ste nyon mongs pa'i 'ching 
308b7(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad rnam par dag ces bya ste/ chos thams cad yongs su dag na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba'i bdud thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// 
308b8(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab ste/ rang bzhin gyis dag pas chos la sems can tha dad pa med de/ sems can thams cad 
309a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos stong pa nyid kyis sems can dag pa'i dbang du byed pa'i rin po che'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi yum 
309a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyadakyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma grub ste/ ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par na sems can dang / ye shes stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du dbyer med pas ye shes rnam 
309a3(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad dbyings su mnyam pas chos kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par 
309a4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i mtshan nyid pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ste/ 'ching ba med pas dngos grub thams cad grub par byed pa'i longs spyod pa'i phyir las kyi rigs 
309a5(rgyud 'grel): kyekyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa med pa'i phyir ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam 
309a6(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba nyid kyis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid du chud cing rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i spyod yul tu 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyang gcig gis gcig bskyed pa yin te/ chos kyi phyag rgya chen pos 
309a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par don 'di nyan pa la sogs te/ grub pa nan tan du byas na 'dod chags la sogs pa chos sna tshogs kyi nang na 'dug kyang nyon mongs pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur te/ pad+ma 'dam gyis mi chags 
309a8(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin te/ de bas na stong pa nyid kyis ye shes gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shes pas nyon mongs pa gsum yang mi spang ba'i dam tshig tu blang zhes 'byung // 
309b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs la spyod kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// hrIHzhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi byang chub/ 
309b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad sa bon 'di las skyes pa'i phyir te/ don mi skye mi 'gag spros pa med pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i mtshan nyid du blta'o// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhes
309b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nas badz+ra hrIHzhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rtag tu gsungs pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang gsungs te/ chos rgya chen po'i spyod yul 'di sems 
309b4(rgyud 'grel): can rnam par dag pa'i don du 'gyur bas 'dzum dmyal te/ pad+ma 'dam gyis mi chags pa bzhin du tshes mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la nyon mongs pa'i dri mas mi gos par mkhyen te/ snying po badz+ra ha zhes gsungs 
309b5(rgyud 'grel): so// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// tAM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs kyi gtso bos 
309b6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas khams gsum thams cad kyis dbang pos dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan to// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 
309b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khams chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob pas khams gsum thams cad kyi chos la mngan mdzad pa// log 
309b8(rgyud 'grel): par lta ba thams cad kyi gnyen po ste/ mthu che ba'i phyir rdo rje dang 'dra bas rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad don dam pa man chad kyi 
310a1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang phan pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i don sbyin pa'i dbang mdzad de/ sems can re ba thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa yid bzhin du thob par 'gyur bas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 
310a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa ma skyes pa'i don shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i sems can thams cad la ston to// chos kyi sbyin
310a3(rgyud 'grel): pas kun kyang dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di la 'jug cing stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 
310a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas dngos grub kyi las thams cad thob par byed pas yid bzhin gyi rin po che las nor rdzas sna tshogs 'byung 
310a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing rdzas kyi sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ste/ sems can dbul po nges pa thams cad lus dang ngag dong sems bde ba thob par 'gyur bas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// so so'i dkyil 'khor
310a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams su zhugs shing stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang chos mnyam pa nyid du nan tan gyis spyad na dkyil 'khor gyi yon tan 'di rnams kyang thob cing dbang byed par 'gyur ro// trAM zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi snying po 
310a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'di'i sa bon las rin po che'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir te/ mi skye mi 'gag spros pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don to// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
310a8(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba nas/ dam tshig rin po che'i snying pos smras so// badz+ra traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rin po che'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi gtso bo nam mkha'i snying pos rtag tu bshad pa'i don 'di 
310b1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bshad pa'i don 'di brtan par bya ba'i phyir te/ dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di bstan na don yod par mkhyen pas bzhin 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo bo la rin po che'i phreng ba 'ching ba yang gzhan thams cad la 
310b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang byed pa'i tha tshig ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad du stong par byas pas stong par gyur pa ma yin gyi/ 
310b3(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid kyi stong pas na yang dag par ma nor bas mtshan nyid la sus kyang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rdo rje lta bu ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po 
310b4(rgyud 'grel): che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par byas pas mtshan ma med pa ma yin gyi chos nyid kyis mtshan ma med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod pa'i dbang du byed 
310b5(rgyud 'grel): pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad smon pa med par byas pas smon pa med pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyis smon pa med ste/ gnyis 
310b6(rgyud 'grel): su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos nyid pas chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas na 
310b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang yongs su dag pas chos nyid kyis dri ma med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku man chad dngos grub thob par byed pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 
310b8(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// a'i don ni rtag tu smos pa dang 'dra/ gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra a zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 
311a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas kyang rtag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khar shinatuN+Da che ba'i phyir bzhin 'dzum bzhin du bstan te/ badz+ra a zhes gsungs 
311a2(rgyud 'grel): so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab chen pos chos thams cad la gcod pa'i ral gri lta bu yin pas na shes rab zab
311a3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i don 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shig gsungs shig pa'i skul ba'i tha tshig pas ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs zhes bya'o// 
311a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa zhes bya nas/ traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 
311a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzad pa la 'jug pa'i don to// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong 
311a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid du mthong la gnyis su med par sbyor ba la mnyam par 'jug pa ni ces kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i rigs 
311a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas chos mnyam pas sems can ma lus pa'i don thams cad mi gtong ba'i dbang du byed pa ni rin po che'i rigs kyi
311a8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la byed par 'gyur ro// rnam pa gcig tu na rin po che ni dbang bskur ba'i las byed pas dbang bskur ba yang 'ga' tsam la ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la dbang bskur bas na mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 
311b1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor ba dus thams cad du mnyam pas na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par 'gyur ro// las kyi/ 
311b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa mnyam par sbyor bas mnyam pa nyid du dngos grub kyi las thams cad du 'jug pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par
311b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// traM zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bshad pa'i don dang 'thun no// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra tsakra hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang 
311b4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas rtag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don shin tu rgya che bar mthong nas bzhin 'dzum bzhin du 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor 
311b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa yin no// badz+ra tsakra hUM zhes bya ba'i don rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bsdus pa zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
311b6(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba nas/ mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya ba'i 
311b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/ gnyis su med pa mnyam par sbyor ba las byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa las 
311b8(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang mchod pa sna tshogs de'i rgyud las 'byung ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyang shin tu rgya che la yangs te/ mthu che ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'jig rten thams cad zil gyi mnan 
312a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba las 'od zer
312a2(rgyud 'grel): mang po phyogs bcur 'phros te/ sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs kyi dbang du byed pa dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul zhing gnas bde ba bskyed de/ snying rje chen po'i 
312a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang du byed pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod do// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam par sbyor bar dam pa'i chos 
312a4(rgyud 'grel): yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyod ba'i las byed pa dang / 
312a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge 'dri ba la sogs pa'i ni las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// tAM zhes bya ba'i don ni rtag tu bstan pa'o// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub 
312a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' zhes bya ba nas/ oM ga ga na swa b+ha ba badz+ra oM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu bstan pa'i don 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi don de dang 'thun par bsnan te
312a7(rgyud 'grel): smras pa'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub ho ha ha zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas 
312a8(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad 'dul nul pa rdo rje'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i don 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams 
312b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis grub pa med do// stong pas mnyam pa'i phyir khro ba yang mnyam pa ste/ chos stong pa khro ba stong pa sems can stong pa bas chos nyid kyi don ma nor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mthu che ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor// 
312b2(rgyud 'grel): lta bus 'dul lo// rin po che'i dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad chos kyis 'dul zhing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral ba'i dbang du byas pas khro ba 'dul te/ stong pa nyid gnyis su med par
312b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir sems can sna tshogs kyi don gyi phyir tho ba spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 
312b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad stong pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir khro ba yang chos nyid de/ chos kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor ba'i mtshan nyid pas na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 
312b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyang zad pa'i mu med pas rdo rje dang 'dra/ khro bas 'dul ba yang de bzhin du sems can rgya che bas khro ba yang rgya che ste/ sems can khro ba gnyis kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir mnyam pa 
312b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid du sbyor zhing sems can gyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dus thams cad du byed pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// ha ha zhes bya ba'i don ni sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir spro 
312b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i las byed pas mgu ba 'am rangs pa'i tha tshig ste/ rgod pa'i mtshan ma sa ha ha zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ha zhes bya ba'i bar du ste 
312b8(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang sems can thams cad smin par 'gyur ba'i don pas lus chud mi za bar dga' bsnan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs shin tu pha rol 'jigs skrag par byed 
313a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs bsgyur nas/ rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i gad mo snying po 'di smras so// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
313a2(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa las su rig par bya'o// hU~M zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas chos 
313a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de sems can thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis mnyam pas shes rab dang pha rol 
313a4(rgyud 'grel): du phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang stong pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos sacog 
313a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dbyer med cing mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos por grub pa med pas stong pa'i mtshan nyid de/ mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing chos thams cad la spyod kyang // 
313a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ bgegs thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir rdo rje lta bur mthu che bas na rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'o/ 
313a7(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas dbang bskur te don byed pa yang sems can 'ga' la byed pa ma yin gyi/ da zi bkol med par sems can thams cad kyi don du byed pas na shes rab dar pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang sems/ 
313a8(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don gyi phyir na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te// chos so cog thams cad chos kyi dbyings nyid las gzhan ma yin pas shes rab dang pha rol tu 
313b1(rgyud 'grel): byin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang chos kyi dbyings te chos nyid pas chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad spyod do cog kyang las 
313b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ste/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba yang dngos grub la sogs te rnam par sna tshogs grub kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil
313b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya'o// hrI zhes bya ba'i don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'thun no// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra a mo g+ha hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom 
313b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don 'dod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dam tshig mi 
313b5(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs nas/ mnyam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba med pa'i snyoms par zhugs nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin 
313b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'i don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po smras so// badz+ra a mo g+ha hUM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i gdon mi za bar btus pa zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 
313b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba nas tra zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin 
313b8(rgyud 'grel): pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sems can thams cad la byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad rnam 
314a1(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad dang ldan pas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la zhugs nas kun kyang bla na med par mngon par
314a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshang rgyabs na sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las gzhan ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang brlabs che bas rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi 
314a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'i phreng bas khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur nas/ sems can 
314a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang de'i spyod lam la 'jug cing mnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i snying pos dbang byed par 'gyur ro// dam tshig rin po che'i dbang bskur ba yin te/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas las thams cad spyod du 'jug 
314a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang sbyin par byed pa sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang 
314a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan pa la 'jug pas/ sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po ste/ chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong
314a7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas sems can thams cad bya ba byed pa la rab tu sbyor gyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas/ sems can thams cad 
314a8(rgyud 'grel): las kyi snying po ste/ dngos grub thams cad mngon par spyod pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// trAM zhes bya ba'i don ni rin po che'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
314b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i sa bon te/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams zhes bya ba nas/ badz+ra hI b+ho swA hA zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor 
314b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyi rim dang ra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang khyad par med de/ mtshungs shing 'dra bas rgya cher bstan nas snying po mchog sngags rnams byin te/ de yid gnyis su med pa mnyam par sbyor bas/ 
314b3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi snying po gsungs so// gzhung las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med ces bya ba nas/ b+h+yo badz+ra oM sarba d+harmA ta/ oM pra ba ni 
314b4(rgyud 'grel): tsa/ hi li hi li/ sarba d+harma ta/ mi lI mi lI/ sarba d+harma ta/ a nu rA ga gi ni swA hA zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med thug pa med pa'i chos kyang stong 
314b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i longs spyod chen po dang ldan par mdzad pas cho ga 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir cho ga 'di yang mtha' yas mu 
314b6(rgyud 'grel): med thug pa med par yongs su byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mnyam par sbyor bas spyod yul thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 
314b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mtha' yas te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs
314b8(rgyud 'grel): spyod chen po nyid yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa sku ni bdud thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam 
315a1(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba'i chos thams cad du mnyam ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i mthu dang 'dra mu med cing gzhan gyis zil gyis mi gnon to// dbang du grub pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes
315a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba ni du ma'i don ma yin te/ mnyam pa nyid gcig tu zad pas chos thams cad kyang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa 
315a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid gcig tu zad de dbyer med pas na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du 
315a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ba tshas mtshan ma sna chags kyi spyod yul la zhugs kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang sgrib par mi 'byung bas shes rab dang par la du phyin pa mthar thug pas na chos thams cad kyang ma par thug pa yin na// 
315a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba yin te/ dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// gzhung las/ gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba nas/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'grub 
315a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra b+h+yo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul 'di nyan pa la sogs te bsgom pa'i bar du nan tan byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dag pa'i 
315a7(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin te/ chos mtshan ma sna tshogs kyi sgor zhugs kyis kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi don gyis sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no// gzhung 
315a8(rgyud 'grel): las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad 
315b1(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pas de dang nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir gus pa zhes ri mor bya ba'i phyir phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba yin no// gzhung las/ oM b+ha ga bAn na rod pa raM bid sha d+ha ya swA hA zhes 
315b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nas/ oM zhes bya ba ste sngags kyi yi ge 'bru drug po 'di rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' so so'i rigs kyi snying po 'di'i don ni spyod pa thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba'i 
315b3(rgyud 'grel): don yin no// rig pa chen po'i snying po 'di bshad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i don te/ ma nor bar ston pa'i dam 
315b4(rgyud 'grel): tshichog gi sgra dang sngags kyi snying po yige 'bru drug brjod pa bar snang la grag go/ sngags kyi snying po 'di rnams ni rig 'dzin thams cad kyis rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya zhing rjes su dran par bya'o// de bzhin 
315b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te chos kyi rnam grangs snying po bstan pa 'di dngos grub thams cad thob par byed pa'i don yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang myur du 'grub par bya bar byin gyis brlabs nas 
315b6(rgyud 'grel): legs so zhes bya ba byin no// oM zhes bya ba'i don ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku lta bu'o// bar ma ni ak+Sho b+h+ya dang / rat+na saM b+ha ba dang / a mo g+ha sid+d+hi 'dus pa'i sku lta bu'o// 
315b7(rgyud 'grel): tha ma ni chos kyi sa a mi tA b+ha lta bur blta'o// yang rnam pa gcig tun thog ma ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha ma ni rab/ bar ma ni byang chub kyi sems lta bu yin no// gzhung las/ sems dpa' chen po 
315b8(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba nas/ blo gros chen po legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rigs kyi yum rnams kyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khoras sa'i yon tan rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ni sems dpa' 
316a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po legs so zhes bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi slob dpon lta bu ste/ stong pa nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor zhing 
316a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud la sogs pa log par lta ba thams cad zil gyis gnon par mdzad de ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i gnyen po bas de'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mnyam pa las ma gyur par 'jig rten
316a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi chos dang longs spyod thams cad la yang mngon par spyod pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis me khyab pas legs so zhes bya bas bstod do// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ni 
316a4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po legs so zhes bya ba yin no// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa de/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun 
316a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzob kyi bden pa dang ldan thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel te mnyam pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur bas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab/ 
316a6(rgyud 'grel): pas theg pa chen po legs so zhes bya ba yin no// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas dngos grub kyi las sna 
316a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mdzad kyis kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid las ma gyur pas ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du yang 'grub la/ shes rab dang thabs chen po chus mi za bas shin tu blo gros dang ldan pa yin pas yon tan bsam 
316a8(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir blo gros chen po legs so zhes bya ba yin no// gzhung las/ tshig 'di ni dge bar smras zhes bya ba nas/ bshad pa la ni mngon par bstod ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ stong pa nyid kyi 
316b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la mdzem pa med par spyod/ shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod yul yang ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ bsod 
316b2(rgyud 'grel): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo/ sems can thams cad kyang mos shing dad par 'gyur ba'i chos chen po yin pas dge bar smras so zhes bya'o// dkyil 'khor chen po 
316b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang phyag na rdo rje bsnams te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du zhugs nas/ mdo sde zab mo 'di yang de bzhin 
316b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i tshul tu bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dbyin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin gyis kyang kun rdzob tu 
316b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyar ba ste/ de bas na mdo sde'i don 'di bstan pas thos pa'i shes rab bskyed de chos nyid kyi rigs pa la brten nas bsam pa'i shes rab kyis don gang yin pa la lhags par byas nas mnyam 
316b6(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba'i don la bsgoms na/ 'bras bu byang chub kyi rigs 'dzin la sogs te/ bla na med pa'i sa man chad dngos grub ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu yod pas sems can kun kyang 
316b7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos spyod pas 'di la 'jug cing sgoms par 'gyur bas 'dul ba'i mchog ces bya'o// mnyam par sbyor ba'i sgo yangs pa 'di la kun kyang mos shing dad par 'gyur la/ longs spyod dang ldan 
316b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bla na med pa'i sa thob par 'gyur bas thob pa'i rgyal po ste/ shes rab dang thabs gnyis mnyam par spyod pas lhag pa'i chos gud na med pas sangs rgyas kyis thob pa las thob pa'i sa che ba bsgrub 
317a1(rgyud 'grel): tu med pas bla na med pas bla na med pa zhes bya'o// sems can gang yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos spyod lam 'di la nyan pa dang sems pa dang bsgom pa la sogs te/ nan tan 
317a2(rgyud 'grel): du byed pa la ni gdon dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / 'tsha bar byed mi nus so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par bya ba dang / dngos 
317a3(rgyud 'grel): grub dam pa ci 'dod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kun gyis ring por mi thogs par ster bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yang mi 'gal bar myur du thob par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa'i chos chen 
317a4(rgyud 'grel): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba byin gyis brlabs pas gsang ba'i don 'di yang rdo rje can gyis grub par 'gyur ro// 
317a5(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po'i chos yangs shing rgya che la longs spyod dang ldan bzhin du 'grub pa'i chos bshad pa 'di la don chen po yod par mthong nas mngon par dga' zhing bstod do// gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 
317a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba nas/ s+t+waM badz+ra oM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni khams gsum thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba yin pas
317a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i chos nyid pas na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor ba spros pa med pa bde ba chen po'i don yod pa mnyam par sbyor ba mi gtong ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa chos yangs shing rgya che ba'i 
317a8(rgyud 'grel): sgo 'di thog ma dad pas rtsom pa nas zhugs nas 'jug bla na med pa thob kyi bar du nyon mongs pa med par sgrib pa thams cad spangs pas na thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus kyi khyad par med par dus thams cad du bde
317b1(rgyud 'grel): ba mnyam pa'i chos gsungs so// mur thug la sogs pa chos zab mo'i don ma mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshes nyid mi shes pa rnams kyis ni dka' thub pa 
317b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa spyad kyis kyang 'bras bu bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro// des na spyod pa kun las 'phags pa'i chos kyang thugs rje can gyis bstan par zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
317b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid kyi ye shes gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor bas longs spyod dang ldan zhing / bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob pa sems can thams cad kyang byang
317b4(rgyud 'grel): chub tu sgrol bar byed pas thog ma dadapal zhugs nas tha ma bla na med pa la sgrol ba la thug gi bar du dus thams cad du bde bas 'dod chags chen po dngos grub kyi dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
317b5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod yul du bstan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 
317b6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba las longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing bde ba 'di yang thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab ste/ don dam pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos 
317b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su mnyam par sbyor bas bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa yang de bzhin 
317b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rin po che'i phreng bas khams gsum gyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar byed pas na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 
318a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam par sbyor bas khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po byed pas sems can gyi khams ma lus 
318a2(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dag pa'i spyod yul la dgod pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i nang na gnas shing sems can gyi don la brtson gyis kyang 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pas mi chags pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das te/ sems can 
318a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i las 'jug cing dngos grub dam pa thams cad thob pa'i las spyod pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yang / dkyil 'khor la lar 
318a4(rgyud 'grel): ni lngang gsungs la/ la lang ni bzhir gsungs/ la lang ni gsum du gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che 
318a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / las kyi rigs te 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang yon tan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang yum lnga'i don bstan to// dkyil 'khor bzhir bstan pa ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi 
318a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsdus te dkyil 'khor bzhir bstan to// gsung rab kha cig las dkyil 'khor gsum du bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du rdo rje'i rigs bsdu 
318a7(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs kyi nang du rin po che'i rigs bsdus pa dang / chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 'di ltar gsum yang dpe ci dang 'dra zhe na/ phyin ci log gi dbang gi lus dang ngag yi gsum gyi skyed 
318a8(rgyud 'grel): yul 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum byung te// sems can nyon mongs pas bcings pas 'khor ba'i nang du sdug bsngal ba yang lus dang ngag dang yid gsum 'khrul pa'i dbang gis gyur to// byin gyi 
318b1(rgyud 'grel): log med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dag pas lus rdo rje zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// ngag rdo rje ste don dam pa'i 
318b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings dang 'thun pas de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// yid rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas na sems can gyi don 
318b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba sna tshogs mdzad pa dngos grub kyi las thams cad mngon par spyod pa'i dbang du byed cing las rnams la spyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi 
318b4(rgyud 'grel): rig sa gcig tu bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor shes bya ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid dgasum rdo rje 'thung bas 'dod chags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rna dza'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ zhe 
318b5(rgyud 'grel): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ gti mug ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pas na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams 
318b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du bshad pas nyon mongs pa'i chos zhes gzhan gud na med pas chos so cog thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin par mngon no// dkyil 'khor phyogs 
318b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dbus lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang spyod yul sngar sngar so sor 'gyur te/ gcig tu na yul gcig las med pa ma yin gyi/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la 
318b8(rgyud 'grel): yang rigs kyi lnga char gyi mtshan nyid yon tan dang spyod yul dang tshogs shing ldan pas ming tsam du dkyil 'khor yang lnga'i mtshan nyid du dbye bar zad do// dkyil 'khor lnga yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ste 
319a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings nyid yin/ rigs kyi yum dang gtso bo nyid las sprul to// mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug kyang rigs kyi yum las gzhan ma yin no// s+t+waM badz+ra oM zhes bya ba'i 
319a2(rgyud 'grel): swA ni dpal dang ldan pa'am bkra shis pa'i mtshan nyid ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid/ oM ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba nas sI zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 
319a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen mo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tha mi dad pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos de na ji lta bzhin du mkhyen 
319a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos so// chos thams cad kyi dbyings las tha me dad pa'i phyir don thams cad bsgrub par gsungs te swAhA zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bkra shis kyi don yin/ hUM dang phaT ces bya ba ni mngon spyod 
319a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dgug pa dang 'ardegs par bya ba'i don yin te/ 'di rigs kyi yum gyis chos thams cad dge zhing bkra shis par gsungs pa'i phyir zhes brjod do// gzhung las/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 
319a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i gnas su ni zhes bya ba nas dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rigs kyi yum gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa 
319a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba la mkhas pa'i mchog thob par 'gyur zhing // sems can 'khor ba'i mtha' med pa de srid du don mdzad pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par shes 
319a8(rgyud 'grel): rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chu chen po 'di la don chud mi za bar mkhyen nas tshigs bcad du bstod pa yin no// 'khor ba'i thog ma dang mtha' med pa'i phyir mtha' mtha' yas med de/ ji tsam 
319b1(rgyud 'grel): du 'khor ba'i mtha' med pa'i bar du stong pa nyid dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni de dang mnyam par sbyor ba ma yin no// de ltar 'khor ba mtha' med pa'i don la sems dang po skyed pa nas zhugs 
319b2(rgyud 'grel): pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyis kyang thog ma snying rje chen po dang smon lam chen pos sems can gyi don la 'jug par bya ba'i shugs kyis sems can gyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar mdzad 
319b3(rgyud 'grel): pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar mi mdzad do// shes rab ces bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin
319b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid de/ de shes rab dang dbyings gnyis su sbyor te mnyam par gyur pa'i dus na/ shes rab dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir shes rab/ 
319b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// thabs ni shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la byang chub kyi sems skyes te/ sems de las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa dang / 
319b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa bskyed pa dang / dngos grub dam pa thams cad bskyed pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byas pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
319b7(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa thabs su 'brel na thabs kyis gzung ba'i shes rab pas shes rab kyang thabs shes rab kyis gzung ba'i thabs pas na thabs kyang shes rab ste/ de ltar shes rab dang thabs dus thams cad du 
319b8(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i dus na ye shes kyi byin brlabs pa'i sa pas chos so cog thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na rang bzhin med pas dag par gyur/ ji srid du sems can 'khor ba'i mtha' med 
320a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar du 'jig rten gyi sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang / 'dod chags kyi nang na spyod kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na de bas na/ 
320a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyang mnyam par sbyor ba la 'dzud cing sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir/ ji srid 'khor ba de tsam gyi bar du sems can 'dul zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed do// chos thams cad 
320a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa med ci la yang mi gnas pa'o// nam mkha' zhes bya ba yang sems can gyi phyin ci log gis las kyi 'bras bu la nam mkha' yang dngos po mi
320a4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i phyir med par 'dzin NAM/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste mnyam pa'i dus ni nam mkha' la ci zhig me na med ces b+ha ste/ med par lta ba yang mi 'byung ba na de bas nanam mkha' la yang 
320a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid grub pa med pa'i phyir ro// chos so cog thams cad kyang nam mkha' bzhin te grub pa med pas mnyam/ rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas na kun gyis 
320a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog mngon pa nyid rdzogs zhes bya'o// / dper na pad+ma tshon gyis sgyur kyang man gyi kha dog gis mi 'gyur ba bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor bas 'gro la phan pa'i don 
320a7(rgyud 'grel): byed kyis nyes pas 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro// shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas longs spyod chen po'i nang du bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i don byed kyang 
320a8(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na longs spyod chen po dang yang mi 'bral ba'i phyir na don che/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mnyam par sbyor ba la gnas pas sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa med 
320b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ni bde ba che ba ste/ de ltar spyod pa na bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs te/ sku gsum lhun gyis grub pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par 
320b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pas na sems can gyi hA zhes bya ba ni chos rgya chen po 'dis sems can smin par 'gyur bas dga' ste rgod pa'i tha tshig go// / stong pa nyid kyi 
320b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang / mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos ni de nyan pa la sogs te bsgom pa'i nan tan chen por byas na bde ba thams cad thob pa dang dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i 
320b4(rgyud 'grel): don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'thun no// gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang de bzhin gshegs par 
320b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi mig chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pas na// 
320b6(rgyud 'grel): oM ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir thog mar 'gro zhes bya'o// de man chad ni tshig gi mjug rgyan te/ yi ge'i nang nas dngos su zer bar zad do// zhal nas gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni ma rabs kun la bka' yis 
320b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang tshig go cog gi don de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab pa yin no bar gzhung las/ mngon sum du gsungs pa'i phyir sems can gyi phyir bstan pa rnams ma nor ba tsam/ 'phags pa shes rab 
320b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// bge rtso gas na zug grus pa da pa phrul/ 
321a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sha tA kA ra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang // de bzhin rnam par 
321a2(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid dang ni// de bzhin spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ mkha' snying rdo rje khu tshur dang // 'jam dbyangs chos kyi 'khor lo can// mkha' mdzod de bzhin 
321a3(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin dang // bsdus pa dag tu yongs su bsgrags// zhi ba mdung gi mtshan dkyil 'khor// ma mo ming po'i dkyil 'khor dang // sring mo rnams kyis bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor bcu dang lnga rnams 
321a4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol byin du ma la bshad de// pha rol phyin pa'i sgo nas gsungs// dkyil 'khor rdo rje can gyi nyid// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pa'i dang // rdo rje mi ltar 'bar nyid dang // 'jig rten dbang dang 
321a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' snying po// bsdus dang meng po'i gang yin dang // sring mo lha dang klu dgag/ lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dag kyang // de bzhin mchog gyur bshad pa yin// rdo rje can dang rgyal nyid dang // rdorje 
321a6(rgyud 'grel): me'abar pad+ma gnyis// rin chen ming po sring mo dang // klu dang sdug bsngal grags bsdus pa// 'di rnams nyid kyis ras ris rnams// gong nas gong du bshad pa yin// rdo rje can dang bde gshegs 
321a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid// phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten dbang // mkha' snying bsdus par bshad pa ste// nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag tu bshad// dpal mchog dang po'i gsum pa las// da ni dkyil 'khor bshad bya ste// rdo rje can 
321a8(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs pad+ma// mkha' snying meng po'i dkyil 'khor dang // sring mo kla dang sdug bsngal grags// gsum pa bcu par bshad pa yin// ras ris lnga pa gnang bar grags// lha mo lnga yi dkyil 
321b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams// bsdus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// dpal mchog dang por bshad pa yin// rdo rje rnam snang nyi ma dang // 'jig rten dbang dang mkha' snying dang // ming po rnams dang srin mo klu// sdug bsngal 
321b2(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang bsdus pa'o// ras ris dkyil 'khor lnga rnams dang // bzhi pa dag tu yongs su bsgrags// dkyil 'khor rnams ni 'byung ba yi// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad bya na// grangs ni bdun 
321b3(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa dku ste// 'di la rnam rtog bya mi dgos// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi grangs byas nas// da ni da lta nyid du yang // phyag rgya'i dum bu bsdus pa dang // mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// dang po 
321b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po nyid// de bzhin gnyis pad ma tshig ste// gsum pa chos kyi rgyang grags pa// bzhi pa las kyi rgyu nyid do// rgya yi dum bu bsdus pa can// skye med nyid du shes bya ste// gang gi mchog 
321b5(rgyud 'grel): tu gtsor gyur gang // phyi nang thams cad yang dag 'dus// 'di yi legs sbyor gtso bo yang // da ni ma lus bshad par bya// gang zhig gang dang yang dag spyod// phyag rgya rim bzhin sbyar bar bya// phyag 
321b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya che dang las su grags// yang dag spyor bar bshad pa yin// dam tshig rgya dang chos kyang ni// 'debs pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod// 'di dag nyid kyis sdus pa dag/ ci 'dra ci phyir bshad bya ste// 
321b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya che dang yang dag sbyor// las kyi rgya zhes pa yin// gang phyir bsnams pa med na ni// nga rgyal 'byung bar mi 'gyur la// nga rgyal med pa nyid kyis na// phyag rgya chen po brtan mi 'gyur// chos 
321b8(rgyud 'grel): med par ni bsgrub bya yi// dam tshig phyag rgya brtan med pas// gang zhig bsgrub par bya sngags la// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod bya// lus ni gnas pa med pa dang // dngos po med cing mtshan med pa/ 
322a1(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med pa'i sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po zla ba byung ba la// de 'og yi ge'i gzugs can te// yi ge las ni mtshan ma byung // mtshan las 
322a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin rang nyid// me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang // so sor rtog dang bya ba'i bzhi// rnam par dag pa'ang nam mkha' ste// dngos med gnas pa lnga pa yin// phyag rgya chen po sar gyur cing // 
322a3(rgyud 'grel): chu nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// chos kyi phyag rgya me nyid de// rlung ni las la rnam par gnas// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yang dag sbyor// de bzhin khams dang skye mched dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu sna

322a8(rgyud 'grel): zlog byed pa'i// yi ge brgya pa dang por brjod// thog ma dbus dang tha mar yang // byin rlob byed pas bzlas par bya// bdag la byin brlob byed nyid dang // tshe yang ring bar 'phel byed cing //

327b1(rgyud 'grel): po phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo sangs/ phyag gnyis kyi sa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bzhad pa 
327b2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar po// phyag gnyis kyi so'i phreng ba gnyi ga dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis bsnams pa'o// rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas 
327b3(rgyud 'grel): bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'byed pa'o// rdo rje rnon po sku mdog gur gum gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas kyis ral gri 'phyar/ 
327b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rdo rje rgyug ser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o// rdo rje smrab su mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pa na dung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa lce'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o// rdo rje 
327b5(rgyud 'grel): las sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams nas spyi bor 'jog cing gar mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje srung ba sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsdams pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog 
327b6(rgyud 'grel): nag po phyag gnyis kyi mche ba gnyis rang gi zhal gyi thad kar bsnams nas gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pas bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams pa 
327b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par bsam mo// // de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya haM zhes bya bas bdag nyid la bltas la/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya ba 'dis mdun du ye shes sems dpa' zla ba'i 
327b8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsgoms la/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M a he zhes bya ba 'dis steng gar bcug ste/ bdag dang mi gnyis pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom mo// de nas yig hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje 'od dang 
328a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i tshul can gyi lce bsam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyis bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang cod pan gyi dbang dang / phreng ba'i dbang dang 
328a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbang la sogs pa rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa// yum rnams kyis bskur bar bsam mo// yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// @6// bzlas 'i phreng ba'im tshan nyid 'azugs / 
328a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ak+Sha pu tra lak+Sha Na/ bod skad du/ bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems dpa' la lha mo sangs rgyas spyan mas/ 
328a4(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa/ bzlas pa'i thang ba'i danici lags// mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsung dugasal// rdosems dpas gsungs pa/ lha mo nyon cig rab tu bshad do// khyod kyis nus pade brjod/ 
328a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de thams cad kyi gtam bshad do// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du'o// mi spong ba'i sems kyi sdom pa de bzhin du bsod nams dang ye shes mi spong ba thob pa'i rnal 'byor 
328a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bzlas pa'i phreng ba 'di'o// gang la bzlas pa'i phreng ba la dad pa mos pa gus pas bzung ngo // sdig pa thams cad spong ngo // sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang du gzung // 
328a7(rgyud 'grel): namagrin pa dang lag pa'i rtsa bar ro// des ni bya ba thams cad 'grub par nges so// bzlas pa byas pas lha mo dang dpa' bo nges par grub pa rab tu ster ro// rnal 'byor mchog gis thob pa'i rdo rje 
328a8(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang mnyam par 'byung ngo // byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis sdig pa mang po byas pa dang / thams cad spangs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rkang pa gcig pa'i bzlas pa'i skud pa 'dzin 
328b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// bzlas na lha'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// phyed kyi tshad kyis bzlas na des lha dang lha mo'i sde mthong ngo // gang ba yis bzlas na brdzun pa'i ngag spongs pa'o// dung gi la bzlas pas yon tan 
328b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig 'byung ngo // lung tang la bzlas pas yon tan gnyis 'byung ngo // lcags la bzlas pas yon tan gsum 'byung ngo // te la la bzlas pas yon tan bzhi'o// nor bu mu tig byu ru'i la

328b4(rgyud 'grel): pa sa bcu drug dang 'dra bar du sa 'das pa yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo // bzlas pas phreng ba'i yon tan 'di dag rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o// mkhas pas lhag pa dang chad par mi bya'o//

328b6(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// gung mos bgrangs pas the tshom med par dngos grub 'byung ngo // srin lag dang bgrangs pas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub 'grub bo// mthe chung dang bgrangs pas
