332b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lha rim pa bzhin du rang rang gi sgrub thabs las bstan pa ji bzhin du bya ste/ tsan dan gyi lde gus thig le zlum por byas la byin gyis brlab pa ni hr-i dmar po las ye shes kyi med pung 
332b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'bar bas de dag nyid du rab tu sbyangs te/ gzhi de yang rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsam po// de nas re re'i gdan du pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i steng a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 
332b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsam mo// de'i dbus su gong du bshad pa ltar lha re re na la rang gi rtog pa las 'byung ba ltar bzhugs su gsol te/ dam tshig sems dpar byas la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs 
332b6(rgyud 'grel): te lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dbang du byas te/ sgrub par bya'o// bdag nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 
332b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbus su rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsams la/ ba spa'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / bde bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa sprin phung ltar
332b8(rgyud 'grel): mu 'byam par 'phro shing / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don mdzad cing byin gyis bzlas nas slar 'dus te/ dam tshig sems dpa' de nyid la thim par bsam mo// de nas mchod pa lnga la sogs// / 
332b9(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas lha so so'i bstod pa re re nas byas la so so'i phrin las dang dam tshig gi sgo nas smon lam gdab bo// de la 'di nyid kyi cho ga'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ 'bi bi nang 
333a1(rgyud 'grel): tulta so so'i snying po// oM hUM traM hri a zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang snying po gong ma gnyis bcug la/ sngags badz+ra d+harmA d+ha tu gar+b+he dz+wa la swAhA zhes brjod pas 
333a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes de de'i nang du zhugs par bsam mo// de nas skor por du yungs ram ki la mar gyis bsdu ba'i sngags oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ zhes gsum brjod pas byang chub kyi 
333a3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis bsgos par bsam mo// de nas skor phor du gzhug pa'i sngags oM badz+ra d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA zhes brjod pas thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings su bsam mo// de nas brdung ba ni 
333a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra mud gar A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hU~M gong ma'i snying po gnyis kyang brjod la/ dbyung ba'i sngags oM d+harmA ra te swA hA zhes brjod pas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang 
333a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi skur grub par bsams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harmA kA ya ma hA su ke su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de las gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis byung bas 'gro ba'i don bsam gyis 
333a6(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab par bsams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ho ga kA ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sarba te thA ga ta nai ri ma Na kA ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de la dang por mchod rten ni chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes smos te/ sa dang 
333a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo dang shing dang gser dngul la sogs pa dag las sems can gyi rtsol bas bsgrubs te/ dbyibs kyi bye brag tu byas pa de dag ni gzugs brnyan zhes gdags te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhung dag las 
333a8(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku ni sku med nam mkha' 'dra zhes 'byung ste/ brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin yang chos thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i don gyis mchod rten gyi dbyibs lta bur grub pas des na chos kyi skur ni rgyu dang 
333b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de la chos kyi sku zhes 'dod do// de bas na 'di ltar snang ba ni gzugs brnyan yin par shes par bya'o// yang na gzugs 'di ltar grub pa ni sku gsum gyi 
333b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul yin te/ rmang dge ba bcu dang / bang rim po nas kha khyer gyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / srog shing shes pa bcu'i bar du rgyu'i chos bsod nams kyi tshogs yin te/ 
333b3(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i mu yin pa dang / 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / char khabs thugs rje chen po dang / zla chos byang chub kyi sems rnam par 
333b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa dang / me long ye shes bzhi dang / tog mngon par shes pa drug dang / dar gyi cod pan dang / gdugs kyi chos kyi skur mnga' gsol te/ chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa dang / chu srin gyi 
333b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan thun mongs ma yin pa'i rgyan chen po ste/ nam mkha' lding gi khams byung ba ni thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang ye shes kyi shugs mnga' ba dang / ba dan chos kyi grags pa chen po 
333b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / dril bu snyan pas phyogs bcur khyab pa dang / rdo reng mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pa dang / them skas bsrung ba med pa gsum mam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ rnam par 
333b7(rgyud 'grel): thar pa bzhi ste stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pa'i lam mkhyen pa dang / dril bu tshangs pa'i dbyangs 
333b8(rgyud 'grel): sam gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas de dag ni 'bras bu'i chos ye shes kyi tshogs yin pas chos kyi skur bstan pa dang / a ma las rin po che'i phreng ba dang / gzhan yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi

334a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i smon lam la 'jug par gyur cig/ 'khor lo'i sngags la oM pra marda na ye swA hA/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum

334a8(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad du dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyi rnam pa mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de dag gi mchod rten dang sku gzugs dang gsung rab la sogs pa

334b8(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan thob par gyur cig/ de nas mchod rten la na bza' gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he d+harmA te swAhA/ gzhal yas khang du gshegs su gsol ba'i 
335a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags la oM d+ha ra d+ha rak+Sha Ta ga ra ye swA hA// bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ rin po che'i gzhal med khang chos kyi

335a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dbang bskur bas de'i ngo bo nyid du brtan par gyur pa yin no// de ltar mchod rten gdab pa yang sngar bshad pa ltar rim pa bzhin bya ste/ dang por mnyam par bzhag ste/ chos thams cad la mi

335b1(rgyud 'grel): zhibar bgyi'o// zhe sdang gi mtshon rnon po bcil bar bgyi'o// bde ba la gzud do// phrag gi tshub ma zhi bar bgyi'o// ser sna'i 'dud pa dgrol bar bgyi'o// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o//

336a3(rgyud 'grel): par gyur cig/ phyag rgya rgya mtsho'i sprin nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug tu gram ste ye shes kyi 'od zer 'dus pa'i sku nang du thim zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas mchod pa lnga dang

337a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// dag pa nyid du nges par mthong zhes smos so// mchod rten chog bdag gis cung zad cem byas la bsod nams rnam pa ci yon

337a8(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni/ zla dang ba las sna tshogs bsgom// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// rang gis bon dbus pasams nas/ 
337b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dag dang phyag rgya dag/ bsam zhing de bzhin nyid du sbyar// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgrub par bya// lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// g.yon pa mnyam gzhag 
337b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang // g.yas pa sa gnon tshul can no// rgyan dang ldan par rang nyid bsgom// thugs kar pad zla'i steng du ni// de steng rang gi sa bon dang // phyag mtshan phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab// rang nyid

337b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad las sku bskyed do// rtsa sngags brgyad po brjod pa la// dri za'i phyogs su pad+ma can// sku mdog dkar mo dpal be'u bsnams// me yi phyogs su 'jig byed ma// sku mdog dkar mo 'khor

337b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su 'od ldan ma// sku mdog dmar skya pad+ma bsnams// rlung gi phyogs su dkar sha ma ma// sku mdog dmar skya bum pa bsnams// gnod sbyin phyogs su dri med pa// sku mdog ljang 
337b7(rgyud 'grel): gu 'bud dung bsnams// dbang ldan phyogs su yid gzhungs ma// sku mdog ljang gu nya bsnams pa'o// sgom bzhi po 'dod lha ste// phyogs dang bstun zhing phyogs bskyong dang // gzhal 
337b8(rgyud 'grel): yas rim par sgom par bya// de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed de// thugs ka'i rdo rje'i hU~M las ni// 'og min gnas su 'od 'bros pas// mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor bsam// rang lus mi 'khrugs 
338a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom stim la// ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// lha yi go rim ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// yang na rang nyid lhar bsgoms la// mi 'khrugs 
338a2(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bsgom par bya// gzungs bgrang ba yi ting 'dzin ni// thugs las 'od zer 'bros pa yis// de nyid sum brtsig rang rang gzhan// lha dang bum pa mchod rten gtor// bum pa mchod rten

379b1(rgyud 'grel): nas gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad// de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang /

379b4(rgyud 'grel): spang // dus kun tu ni byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // lha dang bla ma de bzhin no// sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang // bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/

380b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rnam 'jig cing // skye 'grub mchog thob dang 'dir bkra shis shog/ ji ltar lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdza mchog pu da na// ngur ba'i gdan la rdzogs nas bdud

380b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur bcud ldan bkra shis shog/ rdo rje dang ni rin chen chu skyes dang // de bzhin las kyi sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i// li khris 'jig rten gsum po dbang bsdus shing / dngos grub mchog thob dang 'dir bkra shis

381a1(rgyud 'grel): / mthe bo gnyis gzhabs ljags su bshad// na maHsa man+ta bu d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta dzi tra sarba d+harmA pra ti tiSh+Tha/ lag pa gnyis ni khong stong sbyar// mdzub gnyis ngos nas dkris pa ni// go cha'i phyag rgya zhes su bshad//
